name: Jala Tech Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a multi-sensor technology designed to monitor water conditions and increase the productivity and efficiency of shrimp farms. The company's technology provides water quality monitoring, planning, and reporting tools complete with a decision support system based on data that has been collected and analyzed, enabling farmers to monitor and adjust their treatments and techniques to ensure a healthy and bountiful pond.
one_liner: Developer of a multi-sensor technology designed to monitor water conditions and increase the productivity and efficiency of shrimp farms. The company's technology provides water quality monitoring, planning, and reporting tools complete with a decision support system based on data that has been collected and analyzed, enabling farmers to monitor and adjust their treatments and techniques to ensure a healthy and bountiful pond.
